page.syntax: Separation_Characters as C = TRAILING(C strings,N word_number)

argument.name: strings
argument.description: A string expression containing words separated by repeating characters.

argument.name: word_number
argument.description: Specifies the word in the Input_String to examine. Numeric

page.description: Returns the non-word characters following the specified word.
page.discussion: TRAILING() returns the characters that separate the word_number word in the input, strings, from the next word.
